quest.name: A Radiant Delivery
journal:
Maru seeks capable hands to help with a delivery.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Pick up the supplies for the Radiant Host quartermaster.
Deliver the supplies to the Radiant Host quartermaster.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Forename, there you are. We've need of a stout pair of legs an' a strong back for a delivery, and you came springin' to mind...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: The Radiant Host commissioned a major delivery, an' while the hippos hauled the supplies quick enough, we ain't got enough help off-loadin' them. You up for a bit of exercise?

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: You'd be doin' us a huge favor, and make no mistake. If you're keen, talk to the Rider at the Hamsa Hatchery and he'll get you started straightaway.

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04575
dialogue.text: Ah, so you're the help that Maru sent word about, eh? Lucky you—we've just unloaded the carts, and all that's left is to bring them to their destination.

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04575
dialogue.text: See that great tent over there? Take this crate over to the Radiant Host quartermaster waiting inside and the job'll be done. I'll be right behind you with the rest of the crates.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Deliver the crate of supplies to the Radiant Host quartermaster awaiting you at the specified location in the tent.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You will have two minutes to complete the task. Should you fail, return to the starting location and begin anew.

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04575
dialogue.text: Take one of the crates here and deliver it to the Radiant Host in the tent. I'll carry the rest.

dialogue.name: RADIANTSOLDIER04575
dialogue.text: Ah, I take it those are the supplies we requisitioned! Apologies for the bulk─I can tell by the sweat on your brow that carrying them here was no easy feat.

dialogue.name: RADIANTSOLDIER04575
dialogue.text: It appears the other Rider will be along soon with the rest of the crates, so you can go ahead and thank Maru for another job well done.

dialogue.name: RADIANTSOLDIER04575
dialogue.text: The Rider should be here soon with the rest of the supplies, so let Maru know we appreciate him arranging all of this.

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04575
dialogue.text: You've got what it takes to haul crates with the best of us, I reckon. I can handle the rest, so go and give Maru my regards.

dialogue.name: RADIANTSOLDIER04575
dialogue.text: What's that? Oh, I'm just waiting for the supplies we've ordered. They should be here any moment now...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: I'm guessin' the supplies made it without a hitch? Another job well done─but I ain't never doubted you.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Havin' folks like the Radiant Host as our regular partners gives our business some legitimacy in Radz–at–Han, but we'd never have made it this far in buildin' relationships without your help. Your contribution's been noted─wrote it down an' everythin'.
